page.title: 06THE CREEL INN
page.content: The Creel Inn is a seafood restaurant. It specialises in lobsters and crab caught locally.It has a bar, dining room and a lounge. The Creel Inn is recommended by Egon Ronay, a good food guide and has a reputation for really good seafood. It is a very old building and although it has been modernized and extended people still come to enjoy the old world atmosphere.It is made up from 3 fishermens' houses. It is busy at lunch-time and in the evenings and although it is an Inn you cannot stay overnight. It is usually run by a family and some part-time helpers.
